item.title: Featured App: A New Home for Charlie the Chocolate Chihuahua
item.dc:creator: Rob Miracle
item.description: A New Home for Charlie the Chocolate Chihuahua is an interactive book app from Fat Red Couch. Click through to earn more about this app.
item.content:encoded:
Corona developers are creating some fantastic apps. Today Corona Labs would like to feature, A New Home for Charlie the Chocolate Chihuahua, an interactive book from Fat Red Couch, Inc.

Charlie the Chocolate Chihuahua is a story about a small dog making friends in his new home. Get to know characters like Rockin’ Rob Robin and Shearl, the tailless squirrel while playing interactive games that include puzzles, painting and drawing, interactive sounds and more.

Artwork can be saved to the gallery for sharing. Those saved images can then later be used as part of the games jigsaw puzzle system. The player can adjust the number of pieces to set the puzzle difficulty.

You can find this app:

  • Apple iTunes
  • Google Play
  • Amazon
  • Coming soon for tvOS and OS X!

A portion of the proceeds go to Rocket Dog Rescue, a rescue group that places dogs in approved homes.
